name: Locomio
description:
designing worlds for people who are disabled.


A handicaped character and a non-disabled character have to cooperate to traverse a world that isn't made for those with disabilities.

Both characters have very different controls and abilities. Playing to each other's strengths is key to advancing in this relaxing universe!

Use physics to your advantage, and build your own creative solutions to open-ended movement puzzles!

And lastly, Locomio is about finding cool ways to have fun with your friends!

Locomio was made during the 5-day long ISART Digital Paris Game Jam.

The Jam's theme was "Making a Better world".
The game won the Grand prize, and the theme prize.
